rmp
Class ChannelProvider

java.lang.Object
  rmp.ChannelProvider
public class ChannelProvider
extends java.lang.Object

Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes

Description:
ChannelProvider is a simple class that holds information about the provider of a channel.
That information is retrieved from a "Join Channel Respond Message" that is sent to us as a repond to the join - query message that we sent while trying to join a channel.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Company: JXTA ORG

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String id
          The peer ID of the provider in String representation.
private  java.lang.String name
          The string name of the provider of the channer [peer name].
private  java.lang.String Server_PipeID
          The pipe ID of the ServerPipe of the provider, that listens for incoming BiDiPipe connections
